translations: n.三叉戟；[数] 三叉线；三齿鱼叉

sentences.sentence: Instead, it spent about $4 billion replacing the Tridents with Tomahawks and making room for 60 special-ops troops to live aboard each sub and operate stealthily around the globe.
sentences.translation: 确实，每艘潜艇花掉了40亿美元，因为要把三叉戟导弹换装成战斧导弹，还要在每艘潜艇上为新增的60名特战队员腾出地方，然后才能偷偷摸摸地去全球执行任务。

sentences.sentence: Two steel beams known as the tridents from the original World Trade Center tower were visible inside the National September 11 Museum during construction on July 28, 2011. Mike Segar/Reuters
sentences.translation: 2011年7月28日，两根取自原世贸大厦的三叉戟钢柱在9.11国家纪念馆展出，此时，新世贸大厦的建造正在进行中。
